title: What is the interpretation of buying candy in a dream and distributing it to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen?

preview.html: Interpretation of buying sweets in a dream If you are looking for an interpretation of buying sweets in a dream, we provide it to you through the following lines on the encyclopedia website. Sweets in a dream are praiseworthy visions, except in a few cases, as narrated by great dream interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi. Sweets or someone gives him sweets without paying for them. There are several general interpretations for a person who sees himself buying sweets in a dream, which can apply to all cases, according to dream interpreters. Among these interpretations are the following: Buying sweets in a dream is a sign of an upcoming happy occasion. Buying sweets in a dream could be a sign that this person is preparing for a happy occasion. Whoever buys a certain type of sweets in a dream, this indicates the fulfillment of his desire and goal. He said Dream interpreters also say that a person who sees himself buying sweets could be a sign of his desire and need to hear words of praise and praise, because he wants to attract attention. Interpretation of buying sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a person who buys sweets as an indication that he will hear some false words that It carries hypocrisy, which prompts him to pay money in return. Ibn Sirin also said that seeing someone buying sweets and paying a lot of money in a dream means that the dreamer is paying a lot of money in exchange for false praise and praise. Ibn Sirin believes that a person sees himself buying sweets without paying Its price. Interpretation of buying sweets in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that whoever sees himself buying sweets in a dream is a sign of goodness, and seeing sweets in general does not require buying, making, or eating them, as in all cases it is a good thing. Al-Nabulsi says that the young man who sees sweets in his dream indicates That he will get married soon and that God will make his heart happy with a sincere and good-natured woman. If a person sees sweets in his dream and works as a merchant, this means that God will give him abundant money and profit from his trade. Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing sweets in a dream indicates guidance and repentance, and that God has forgiven the vision of his sins due to many issues. Asking for forgiveness and supplication. He said that sweets in a dream indicate the taste of the sweetness of faith and closeness to God Almighty. And if the ruler is corrupt and wrong, then it shows the sweetness of the world and its evils, and God knows best. It is believed that sweets with their delicious taste in a dream almost show comfort if one is in trouble and delusions. If the dreamer is suffering from an illness, this indicates an imminent recovery. Interpretation of buying sweets in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen sees sweets in a dream as a praiseworthy and cherished vision because it indicates goodness, health, livelihood, blessings, good circumstances and guidance. Ibn Shaheen says that seeing a person alone buying Sweets are a sign that you enjoy peace, stability and tranquility for him and his family. Ibn Shaheen also believes that buying sweets in a dream indicates that the dreamer is close to God Almighty and that he is close to God Almighty and that he is a good person. title: Interpretation of a dream of muffled screaming in a dream - hearing screaming in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a muffled scream. No hidden sound is drowned out in the dream on the Moments website, the largest dream interpretation site in the Middle East. Explanation of a muffled scream, or a scream in which a person tries to let out his voice but is unable, or screams and no one hears him, as if his voice disappears, or tries but is unable to scream in all of these cases. It is called A muffled scream, and this appears if it is for an unmarried girl, a married woman, or a divorced woman, for pregnant women, for men, and in most cases it is good and in a few cases it is undesirable. Interpretation of a dream of a muffled scream in a dream by Ibn Sirin Whoever sees in a dream a male or female that he is trying to scream or scream without making a sound and it does not come out. Tears from his eyes, it is him. The great joy or food that the god will receive, and also if he shouts at someone and they do not listen, it will be good. And if the person sees that he is trying to scream but he cannot get his voice out and he feels distressed and does not let his voice out. It is a way out of distress and anxiety. And the anguish that we witness at that time or indicates a cure for an illness or chronic disease. And if the screams and the sound come out from the fortuneteller without him doing that, or without opening his mouth to scream, a disaster will befall him. Likewise, if he wants to scream while trying to prevent himself from emitting the sound, or to hide it. By himself, he suffers from sadness and sorrow and lives for a period related to the duration, which prevented his voice from dying, and God knows every situation and condition. Interpretation of screaming in a dream without a sound for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees the same sound of screaming in a dream, this is evidence that she is living a stable life and it also appears That she is calm and there is nothing else bothering her. In the place of a single girl, she sees herself shouting loudly at someone in a dream. This is an indication that in reality she has all the affection and love for that person, as if she saw that someone is shouting at her, and this showed that He communicates with this person with all sympathy and love. Seeing an unmarried girl indicates that she is screaming at someone or that someone is shouting at her, indicating that her marriage is imminent. Interpretation of a dream about screaming without sound in a dream for a married woman: A married woman screaming in a dream is evidence of her determination. To achieve her goal on the ground. It also symbolizes that the visionary is characterized by self-confidence and is characterized by the fact that her hopes and aspirations are endless. If you see a married woman screaming and being controlled by a wave of anger mixed with anxiety. This is an indication that there is a set of hopes and aspirations that they are trying to achieve. But it is He fears failure and disappointment in achieving what he wants. This vision also indicates that the dreamer is strong in character, patient, and self-confident without obstacles. Interpretation of screaming in a dream for a divorced woman and its meaningIf a woman who has separated from her husband, either with his death or with the completion of the divorce between them, sees that she is screaming in a dream for a divorced woman and its meaning. The dream. This is a sign that he will hear good news soon. It also indicates her marriage to a person with a high status in society or marriage to a relative, either a daughter or a sister. Interpretation of seeing a man screaming in a dream without a sound. If the man sees himself screaming in a dream, but without If he makes a sound, this is a sign that he made a wasted effort that did not bear fruit

title: The most important interpretations of seeing a child in a dream for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a child is one of the favorite visions for many of us, and this vision has many connotations that differ according to many considerations, including that the child may be male or female, may be beautiful or ugly, and may be sick. Or suffers from a genetic defect, and what concerns us in this article is to read all the indications and special cases of seeing a child in a single dream. The most important interpretations of seeing a child in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin A child in a dream for singles Seeing a child expresses goodness, blessing, living, integrity of intention, common sense, simplicity in lifestyle, enjoying spontaneity and good qualities. Seeing a child in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the hidden desires and instincts that run inside her, such as the maternal instinct, love for children, dealing with them and caring about their concerns. The vision can be an indication of serious thinking about some important projects or doing a new experience that they did not have before. If the child is an infant, this indicates anxiety, burdens and many difficulties that prevent him from moving and progressing, and the restrictions that restrict him and pull him back. If she sees the child approaching her, this indicates desires that have been absent for a long time, and the many goals that she wants to achieve one day. If the child is tall, it shows fatigue and overthinking, and is waiting for something with great eagerness and fears that it will fail His expectations or that things will turn out differently than he planned. On the other hand, this vision refers to childhood memories, the days when they had a degree of freedom compared to the present, and the peace of mind that is now appreciated. A child in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin sees that seeing a child expresses many duties, responsibilities, prevailing concerns and problems that are difficult to deal with with the mind. This vision also indicates true religion, purity and cleanliness of the soul, good nature, certainty, simplicity, spontaneity of speech and action. If an unmarried woman sees a child in her dream, this is a sign of marriage in the near future, changing circumstances upside down, and the good news of achieving a goal she has long wanted to achieve. Seeing children in a dream is also a sign of happiness, openness, good morals, noble origin, kindness of heart and distance from influences that would strengthen them in their judgments. On the other hand, this vision indicates smooth dealing and avoiding many of life's complexities, avoiding all problems and conflicts with others and may be subject to misunderstandings on the part of some. If she sees that she is giving birth to a child, this represents marriage or Engagement, and the vision may indicate some news that will arrive in the near future. However, if she sees that she is selling the child, this indicates getting rid of the good qualities that distinguished her, violating common sense, and replacing wealth with poverty and misguidance. title: Interpretation of seeing mango in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing mangoes by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees a yellow mango in a dream, this is good news for the closest person to joy and happiness. Whoever sees in the dream that picking mangoes from trees and that they were fresh is evidence of this person’s good reputation. If a married man dreams that he is picking mangoes, this is evidence of his intense love for his wife. Whoever sees that he is collecting mangoes, this is evidence of travel. Whoever sees mangoes in a dream, this is an indication of getting rid of the problems and fears that the dreamer is in. If a person sees in a dream that he is picking mangoes and they are rotten, then this is a sign of bad news that the dreamer will receive, as well as a sign of On problems and anxiety. Within a green mango dream, it indicates the wisdom and dignity of the visionary. If a woman sees herself sharing a mango with her husband, this indicates the close relationship between them. If a mango tree is seen in a large size, this indicates big dreams that are difficult to achieve. A mango tree is considered every year in A dream is evidence of a lot of nourishment. A mango in a dream about a trip, means making things easier. A rotten mango is a sign that something bad will happen to the dreamer, and this is the only bad vision of the appearance of mangoes in a dream. Interpretation of a vision of mangoes for a single woman. Whoever dreams that he is eating mangoes, this is an indication of Collapse of anxiety. If an unmarried girl sees that she was eating mango and was very happy and cheerful, this indicates her approach to marriage. If an unmarried woman sees that she is drinking mango juice, this is a sign of psychological comfort and a good thing that she will receive. If she sees that she is preparing mango juice, This is an indication that she will enter a new life and it could be a successful and happy marriage. Interpretation of a dream about mango for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees a dream that she is eating mango, this is evidence of the safety of her camel and that her new baby will be happy and happy when he grows up. Interpretation of a dream about mango for a married woman If a married woman sees drinking mango juice in In a dream, this indicates the livelihood that you will obtain. Whoever sees in a dream that he is cutting a mango, this is a sign of solving problems, eliminating worries, and a happy married life. title: The 60 most important guides to interpreting a dream about a gift according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about a gift in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about a gift in a dream: Is it limited to the type of gift and whether the dreamer enjoyed it in the dream or not? The dreamer can see that someone gave him a gift consisting of a golden ring, the Qur’an, roses, perfumes, and a closed box, the contents of which are unknown. All of these symbols have different interpretations and will be explained in detail in the following paragraphs. You have a dream that confuses you. Wait... Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a gift. If the dreamer sees a closed box, wrapped in a beautiful way, and it is said in the dream that this box is a gift to him from someone, but he did not open it until he knew what was inside it, then this dream is a metaphor for the events that he will experience in the future. And he will be surprised by it. The more beautiful the gift is on the outside, and the dreamer’s inner feeling that it will be something useful to him, the more positive the surprise he will soon experience. But if the gift is in a strange shape on the outside and the dreamer in the dream is afraid to open it and feels like it is something bad or scary, then this It indicates the bad events he experienced earlier, and he will be shocked. With it, and therefore the feelings of the fortuneteller are a very important thing in the meaning of the dream. If the dreamer dreams of a gift that came to him from a strange place and was bought for him by an unknown person, then his reputation among relatives and strangers is good, and therefore there are people whom he does not actually know, but who know. To him and say kind words to him.If the dreamer wants to buy a gift for someone in his waking life because he has gone through happy circumstances such as marriage or success and sees in his dream that he is buying a beautiful gift for the same person, then this is a dream. Seeing many people in a dream who bought him beautiful gifts and gave them to him indicates their great love for him. Interpretation of a dream about a gift by Ibn Sirin: A gift in a dream according to Ibn Sirin indicates an imminent marriage. When an unmarried young man gives a gift to a girl he loves in reality, it means that he is proposing to her and marrying her if she gets the gift in the dream. She is happy with him. When an unmarried person gives her a gift in a dream and takes it from a young man she knows, there will be a marriage between them. However, if she rejects the gift and leaves that person in the dream and goes, then she will reject the marriage proposal. Which he made for her in the following days. When the dreamer is a father of daughters in reality and sees someone giving him a gift, this person asks to marry his daughter soon. Ibn Sirin confirmed that gifts between people in a dream are evidence of the bond and intense love between them, provided that they are beautiful and make the dreamer happy. Happy, because one can see some strange symbols in a dream, such as a person sending a gift to someone else, and when he opens it he finds it to be some kind of reptile or something strange that cannot be used and benefited from, and in this case the gift is no longer a kind of friendship and love, but rather bad luck and Damage arising from the same person. A sister dreams that her brother buys her a gift that made her very happy, because she is on the verge of happy and bright occasions in reality, and apart from her brother’s love and support for her in her life, she can win something because of that. preview.html: Interpretation of buying sweets in a dream If you are looking for an interpretation of buying sweets in a dream, we provide it to you through the following lines on the encyclopedia website. Sweets in a dream are praiseworthy visions, except in a few cases, as narrated by great dream interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi. Sweets or someone gives him sweets without paying for them. There are several general interpretations for a person who sees himself buying sweets in a dream, which can apply to all cases, according to dream interpreters. Among these interpretations are the following: Buying sweets in a dream is a sign of an upcoming happy occasion. Buying sweets in a dream could be a sign that this person is preparing for a happy occasion. Whoever buys a certain type of sweets in a dream, this indicates the fulfillment of his desire and goal. He said Dream interpreters also say that a person who sees himself buying sweets could be a sign of his desire and need to hear words of praise and praise, because he wants to attract attention. Interpretation of buying sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a person who buys sweets as an indication that he will hear some false words that It carries hypocrisy, which prompts him to pay money in return. Ibn Sirin also said that seeing someone buying sweets and paying a lot of money in a dream means that the dreamer is paying a lot of money in exchange for false praise and praise. Ibn Sirin believes that a person sees himself buying sweets without paying Its price. Interpretation of buying sweets in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that whoever sees himself buying sweets in a dream is a sign of goodness, and seeing sweets in general does not require buying, making, or eating them, as in all cases it is a good thing. Al-Nabulsi says that the young man who sees sweets in his dream indicates That he will get married soon and that God will make his heart happy with a sincere and good-natured woman. If a person sees sweets in his dream and works as a merchant, this means that God will give him abundant money and profit from his trade. Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing sweets in a dream indicates guidance and repentance, and that God has forgiven the vision of his sins due to many issues. Asking for forgiveness and supplication. He said that sweets in a dream indicate the taste of the sweetness of faith and closeness to God Almighty. And if the ruler is corrupt and wrong, then it shows the sweetness of the world and its evils, and God knows best. It is believed that sweets with their delicious taste in a dream almost show comfort if one is in trouble and delusions. If the dreamer is suffering from an illness, this indicates an imminent recovery. Interpretation of buying sweets in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen sees sweets in a dream as a praiseworthy and cherished vision because it indicates goodness, health, livelihood, blessings, good circumstances and guidance. Ibn Shaheen says that seeing a person alone buying Sweets are a sign that you enjoy peace, stability and tranquility for him and his family. Ibn Shaheen also believes that buying sweets in a dream indicates that the dreamer is close to God Almighty and that he is close to God Almighty and that he is a good person. title: Interpretation of a dream about muffled screaming in a dream - hearing screaming in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a muffled scream. No hidden sound is drowned out in the dream on the Moments website, the largest dream interpretation site in the Middle East. Explanation of a muffled scream, or a scream in which a person tries to let out his voice but is unable, or screams and no one hears him, as if his voice disappears, or tries but is unable to scream in all of these cases. It is called A muffled scream, and this appears if it is for an unmarried girl, a married woman, or a divorced woman, for pregnant women, for men, and in most cases it is good and in a few cases it is undesirable. Interpretation of a dream of a muffled scream in a dream by Ibn Sirin Whoever sees in a dream a male or female that he is trying to scream or scream without making a sound and it does not come out. Tears from his eyes, it is him. The great joy or food that the god will receive, and also if he shouts at someone and they do not listen, it will be good. And if the person sees that he is trying to scream but he cannot get his voice out and he feels distressed and does not let his voice out. It is a way out of distress and anxiety. And the anguish that we witness at that time or indicates a cure for an illness or chronic disease. And if the screams and the sound come out from the fortuneteller without him doing that, or without opening his mouth to scream, a disaster will befall him. Likewise, if he wants to scream while trying to prevent himself from emitting the sound, or to hide it. By himself, he suffers from sadness and sorrow and lives for a period related to the duration, which prevented his voice from dying, and God knows every situation and condition. Interpretation of screaming in a dream without a sound for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees the same sound of screaming in a dream, this is evidence that she is living a stable life and it also appears That she is calm and there is nothing else bothering her. In the place of a single girl, she sees herself shouting loudly at someone in a dream. This is an indication that in reality she has all the affection and love for that person, as if she saw that someone is shouting at her, and this showed that He communicates with this person with all sympathy and love. Seeing an unmarried girl indicates that she is screaming at someone or that someone is shouting at her, indicating that her marriage is imminent. Interpretation of a dream about screaming without sound in a dream for a married woman: A married woman screaming in a dream is evidence of her determination. To achieve her goal on the ground. It also symbolizes that the visionary is characterized by self-confidence and is characterized by the fact that her hopes and aspirations are endless. If you see a married woman screaming and being controlled by a wave of anger mixed with anxiety. This is an indication that there is a set of hopes and aspirations that they are trying to achieve. But it is He fears failure and disappointment in achieving what he wants. This vision also indicates that the dreamer is strong in character, patient, and self-confident without obstacles. Interpretation of screaming in a dream for a divorced woman and its meaningIf a woman who has separated from her husband, either with his death or with the completion of the divorce between them, sees that she is screaming in a dream for a divorced woman and its meaning. The dream. This is a sign that he will hear good news soon. It also indicates her marriage to a person with a high status in society or marriage to a relative, either a daughter or a sister. Interpretation of seeing a man screaming in a dream without a sound. If the man sees himself screaming in a dream, but without If he makes a sound, this is a sign that he made a wasted effort that did not bear fruit

title: The most important interpretations of seeing a child in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a child is considered one of the favorite visions for many of us, and this vision has many connotations that vary according to many considerations, including that the child may be male or female, it may be beautiful or ugly, and it may be sick. Or he suffers from a genetic defect, and what concerns us in this article is to read all the indications and special cases of seeing a child in one dream. The most important interpretations of seeing a child in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. A child in a dream for single people. Seeing a child expresses goodness, blessing, livelihood, sound intentions, common sense, and simplicity in lifestyle. And enjoying spontaneity and good qualities. Seeing a child in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the hidden desires and instincts that flow within her, such as the maternal instinct, love for children, dealing with them, and taking care of their concerns. The vision could be an indication of serious thinking about some important projects or undertaking a new experience that was not possible. They have before. If the child is an infant, this indicates anxiety, burdens, and the many difficulties that prevent him from moving and progressing, and the restrictions that restrict him and pull him back. And if she sees the child approaching her, this indicates desires that have been absent for a long time, and the many goals that she wants Achieve it one day. If the child is tall, he shows fatigue and over-thinking, waiting for something with great eagerness and fearing that his expectations will fail or that things will turn out differently than he planned. On the other hand, this vision indicates childhood memories, and the days when They had a degree of freedom compared to the present, and the peace of mind that is valued now. A child in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a child expresses many prevailing duties, responsibilities, concerns, and problems that are difficult to deal with with the mind. This vision also indicates True religion, purity and purity of the soul, good nature, certainty, simplicity, and spontaneity of speech and action. If an unmarried woman sees a child in her dream, this is a sign of marriage in the near future, changing circumstances upside down, and good news of achieving a goal she has always wanted to achieve. Seeing children in a dream is also a sign of happiness, openness, good morals, noble origin, kindness of heart, and distance from influences that would strengthen them in their judgments. On the other hand, this vision indicates smooth dealing and avoiding many of life’s complications, avoiding all problems and conflicts with others and may She is vulnerable to misunderstanding on the part of some. If she sees that she is giving birth to a child, this represents marriage or engagement, and the vision may indicate some news that will arrive in the near future. But if she sees that she is selling the child, this indicates getting rid of the good qualities that distinguished her, Violating common sense, and replacing wealth with poverty and misguidance. The most important interpretations of seeing a child in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a beautiful child in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of this vision is related to its appearance.

title: Interpretation of seeing mango in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing mangoes by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees a yellow mango in a dream, this is good news for the closest person to joy and happiness. Whoever sees in the dream that picking mangoes from trees and that they were fresh is evidence of this person’s good reputation. If a married man dreams that he is picking mangoes, this is evidence of his intense love for his wife. Whoever sees that he is collecting mangoes, this is evidence of travel. Whoever sees mangoes in a dream, this is an indication of getting rid of the problems and fears that the dreamer is in. If a person sees in a dream that he is picking mangoes and they are rotten, then this is a sign of bad news that the dreamer will receive, as well as a sign of On problems and anxiety. Within a green mango dream, it indicates the wisdom and dignity of the visionary. If a woman sees herself sharing a mango with her husband, this indicates the close relationship between them. If a mango tree is seen in a large size, this indicates big dreams that are difficult to achieve. A mango tree is considered every year in A dream is evidence of a lot of nourishment. A mango in a dream about a trip, means making things easier. A rotten mango is a sign that something bad will happen to the dreamer, and this is the only bad vision of the appearance of mangoes in a dream. Interpretation of a vision of mangoes for a single woman. Whoever dreams that he is eating mangoes, this is an indication of Collapse of anxiety. If an unmarried girl sees that she was eating mango and was very happy and cheerful, this indicates her approach to marriage. If an unmarried woman sees that she is drinking mango juice, this is a sign of psychological comfort and a good thing that she will receive. If she sees that she is preparing mango juice, This is an indication that she will enter a new life and it could be a successful and happy marriage. Interpretation of a dream about mango for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees that she dreams that she is eating mango, this is evidence of the safety of her camel and that her new baby will be happy and happy when he grows up. Interpretation of a dream about mango for a married woman If a married woman sees drinking mango juice in In a dream, this indicates the livelihood that you will obtain. Whoever sees in a dream that he is cutting a mango, this is a sign of solving problems, eliminating worries, and a happy married life. title: The 60 most important guides to interpreting a dream about a gift according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about a gift in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about a gift in a dream: Is it limited to the type of gift and whether the dreamer enjoyed it in the dream or not? The dreamer can see that someone gave him a gift consisting of a golden ring, the Qur’an, roses, perfumes, and a closed box, the contents of which are unknown. All of these symbols have different interpretations and will be explained in detail in the following paragraphs. You have a dream that confuses you. Wait... Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a gift. If the dreamer sees a closed box, wrapped in a beautiful way, and it is said in the dream that this box is a gift to him from someone, but he did not open it until he knew what was inside it, then this dream is a metaphor for the events that he will experience in the future. And he will be surprised by it. The more beautiful the gift is on the outside, and the dreamer’s inner feeling that it will be something useful to him, the more positive the surprise he will soon experience. But if the gift is in a strange shape on the outside and the dreamer in the dream is afraid to open it and feels like it is something bad or scary, then this It indicates the bad events he experienced earlier, and he will be shocked. With it, and therefore the feelings of the fortuneteller are a very important thing in the meaning of the dream. If the dreamer dreams of a gift that came to him from a strange place and was bought for him by an unknown person, then his reputation among relatives and strangers is good, and therefore there are people whom he does not actually know, but who know. To him and say kind words to him.If the dreamer wants to buy a gift for someone in his waking life because he has gone through happy circumstances such as marriage or success and sees in his dream that he is buying a beautiful gift for the same person, then this is a dream. Seeing many people in a dream who bought him beautiful gifts and gave them to him indicates their great love for him. Interpretation of a dream about a gift by Ibn Sirin: A gift in a dream according to Ibn Sirin indicates an imminent marriage. When an unmarried young man gives a gift to a girl he loves in reality, it means that he is proposing to her and marrying her if she gets the gift in the dream. She is happy with him. When an unmarried person gives her a gift in a dream and takes it from a young man she knows, there will be a marriage between them. However, if she rejects the gift and leaves that person in the dream and goes, then she will reject the marriage proposal. Which he made for her in the following days. When the dreamer is a father of daughters in reality and sees someone giving him a gift, this person asks to marry his daughter soon. Ibn Sirin confirmed that gifts between people in a dream are evidence of the bond and intense love between them, provided that they are beautiful and make the dreamer happy. Happy, because one can see some strange symbols in a dream, such as a person sending a gift to someone else, and when he opens it he finds it to be some kind of reptile or something strange that cannot be used and benefited from, and in this case the gift is no longer a kind of friendship and love, but rather bad luck and Damage arising from the same person. A sister dreams that her brother buys her a gift that made her very happy, because she is on the verge of happy and bright occasions in reality, and apart from her brother’s love and support for her in her life, she can win something because of that. title: Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream by Ibn Shirin and seeing hearing or reading Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream are among the surahs that indicate obedience to God and righteousness. Wealth and abundance of money, and in this article you will explain in detail the vision of Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream about a man, a woman, a young man and a girl in the summit location. What are the indications for interpreting Ibn Shirin’s vision of Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream? Seeing one reciting Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream is one of the dreamer’s good visions, male. Male or female, and an indication of goodness and blessing for the dreamer. The vision warns the seer or dreamer against engaging in gossip and talking about gossip and gossip and avoiding it. It also indicates a message warning the dreamer against immorality, avoiding sin and wrongdoing, and repenting to God. It also indicates abundance of sustenance and abundance. Goodness for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream for a man. This vision may indicate a married, divorced, or widower who will marry again. Seeing reciting Surat Al-Tahrim for a married man indicates repentance from sin and returning to God. And seeing reading or hearing Surat Al-Tahrim for a divorced person may indicate his return. To his ex-wife and the goodness of his life, and indicates to the widow that he will marry again. Hearing Surat Al-Tahrim may foretell the necessity of abandoning the sin that the dreamer unknowingly avoids. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream for a young man: Seeing or hearing Surat Al-Tahrim for a young man is one of the good visions that indicate that the young man will stay away from sin. And sins, obedience to Him, and the integrity of God’s commandments. It may indicate that this young man is committing many sins and needs to repent and return to God. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream for a single woman. Seeing one reciting Surat Al-Tahrim in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her integrity in obedience to God and staying away from disobedience and transgressions. Seeing hearing Surat Al-Tahrim may indicate the necessity of staying away from gossip and gossip. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing Surat Al-Tahrim on the part of a divorced woman may indicate abundant livelihood and great goodness for her, and it may indicate her returning to his divorced wife, and the return of things to stability, good condition and her life. Interpretation of seeing Surah Al-Tahrim in a dream for a widow: Seeing hearing Surah Al-Tahrim in a widow’s dream indicates obedience and uprightness to God’s commandments, continuing good deeds, and staying away from those who encourage her to speak backbiting and gossip. Also, seeing reading Surah Al-Tahrim indicates repentance and returning to God. Interpretation of seeing Surah Al-Tahrim in a dream Prohibition in a dream for a married woman: Seeing Surat Al-Tahrim for a married woman indicates justice, piety, and stability in her married life. The vision is that she wants to take care of her home, her husband, and her children, and continue to obey God and not say much about the secrets of her home. Also, seeing her listening to Surat Al-Tahrim indicates avoiding Sins, transgressions, and the abundance of livelihood that enters her home. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman listening to Surat Al-Tahrim is evidence of a blessing entering her home and abundant wealth. It also indicates ease of childbirth, ease of childbirth, and the birth of a righteous child. Seeing Surat Al-Tahrim

title: Interpretation of a hole in a dream and falling into a hole in a dream

preview.html: The dream of a hole is for an unmarried woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man. Either she has to go out or fill it up and escape from falling into the deep black hole that contains water or mud, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a hole in a dream: The Hole When a person sees a hole in reality or falls into it in reality, this feeling It is a feeling full of pain and a sense of loss, and death can result from falling into a pit in reality. Seeing a man standing on the edge of the pit without falling into it symbolizes the emergence of a dispute and quarrel with his wife and wife, which led to a quarrel between them for a short period, and they will soon reconcile. Strong will. As for the man who sees in his dream as if he is emerging from a small hole he fell into, this symbolizes the recovery of the sick person or the release of the prisoner and captive, his freedom, and the return of the absent person. Seeing a hole in a dream means a short trip, and the sign of falling into a hole may express and symbolize safety from fear and distance from the fears and horror that the dreamer fears. The hole may indicate the place where the dreamer was hiding from the enemy. Seeing the dreamer as if he had fallen into a hole without That harm or harm befalls him, and in that hole there was delicious and delicious food and drink. He also found clothes in the hole covering his private parts, symbolizing abundant sustenance, abundant goodness, and reconciliation from enemies. A man who sees himself falling into the hole symbolizes his separation from his wife and his divorce from her. And whoever sees that he has fallen into a pit, and this pit has no way out or exit, and the person realizes that he is inevitably doomed, this means that this person will betray one of his friends, and the misfortune will betray him. Let it be like this until the depth and breadth of that pit into which he fell is seen in a dream. As for the one who sees himself falling into the pit and asking the world for help and screaming for someone to hear him and save him, but he finds no response to his call and no comfort for him. From this hole symbolizes his grave, as in the grave there is no help or support for the dead. Seeing holes in a dream symbolizes the conspiracy that is weaving and weaving to override opinion, so the dreamer must be careful and find reasons to avoid disaster. The hole may be a sign of the poor woman who is not It has no cover or cover. Seeing the hole in the dream of an unmarried girl and an unmarried woman is a strong indication of her marriage, especially if this unmarried girl sees herself falling into the hole, but without hurting her. Otherwise, this indicates failure and you must be careful not to sign or Cheating by a malicious person. As for a married woman, the hole in her dream is a sign of her pregnancy if she falls into it, and this is in the dream of a newly married woman. As for a woman who gave birth, this dream indicates a dispute with her husband, but she will leave soon. If you dream that you are looking in a hole, you will You commit nonsense in the field of work and others will leave you because of your many complaints. If you fall into a hole in a dream, this means deep anxiety and sadness. If you wake up feeling that you will fall into a hole, this means that you escaped from the distress and anxiety that could have befallen you. If you dream of a hole, this means You won't need it, you
